title: Eid al-Ghadeer - Thanksgiving
text: DESC: Iqbal Aamal mentions a 2 Rakat Salat thanksgiving prayer
DESC: ‚Ä¢ In the 1st Rakat recite [Sura Fatiha](Quran:1) and [Sura Qadr](Quran:97)
DESC: ‚Ä¢ In the 2nd Rakat recite [Sura Fatiha](Quran:1) and [Sura Ikhlaas](Quran:112)
DESC: üí† Upon completion, prostrate yourself, and say the following when prostrating:

Oh God, we turn our faces to you on the day of our festival, which you honored us with the wilayat of Maulana Commander of the Faithful Ali bin Abi Talib, peace be upon him .whom we rely on and seek help from for all our affairs.
Oh God, To You we prostrate as does our face,our hair , our skin, our bones, our nerves, our blood
‚ÄúO' my God! You alone I worship and to You alone I humble myself, and to You I prostrate. We follow the nation of Abraham (as) and the religion of Muhammad and his Trustees (as).
We are Muslims, not of the atheists, nor those who deny God.
O' my God! Please damn those who deny God, those who disagree and those who oppose Your Orders and the orders of Your Prophet (as).
O' my God! Please damn those who were hostile to them ‚Äì such extensive damnation whose beginnig is without cessation and whose end is without any break through.
O' my God! Please bestow Your Blessings on Muhammad and his Progeny and make us steadfast in Your Love, love for Your Prophet and his family, and love for the Commander of the Faithful.
O' my God! Please grant us the good of this world, and the good of the Hereafter with the best afterlife. O‚Äü our Master and Gaurdian!‚Äù
